channel.title: Armour absorb for vistex v7 saves lives
channel.description: its kind of hard to explain what happens but when someone gets hit with like a 250 there armor absorbs 12 damage when they should of died they just gain the 12 health and stay alive

item.title: Armour absorb for vistex v7 saves lives
item.dc:creator: @dreamedsoul dreamedsoul
item.description:
@dreamedsoul wrote:

say player has 990 health, total damage dealt 990
23 damage absorbed, 967 landed
they should have 0 health but they get 23 health.
this only happens if the “should be” killing blow is a soaked hit

http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=bipb8i&s=8#.U04H6hpFeSg

Read full topic
item.source: Armour absorb for vistex v7 saves lives

item.title: Armour absorb for vistex v7 saves lives
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Post your combat methods, etc. etc. A hacky fix would be to force set armour to 0 before calculating damage etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Armour absorb for vistex v7 saves lives

item.title: Armour absorb for vistex v7 saves lives
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Okay.
Give me 3 different scenario’s with this:

How much health does player have? What is the Total damage dealt? How much of it is absorbed? How much of it landed(unabsorbed)? How much health should they have(assume it CAN be negative)
Hypotheticals: How it should work Hit - absorb - does not die Hit - absorb - does die The one you are experiencing.

Read full topic
item.source: Armour absorb for vistex v7 saves lives

item.title: Armour absorb for vistex v7 saves lives
item.dc:creator: @dreamedsoul dreamedsoul
item.description:
@dreamedsoul wrote:

the cause of the problem im not sure
what happens is when the should die there armor absorb keeps them from death
whats apposed to happnen is the armor absorbs damage but not save there lives
what i have tryied so far is asking moparscape and rune-server
i got source andpeople kept getting away with like 3hp "x10 hits"
i do not know where problem is located
i do not know what method is in it

Read full topic
item.source: Armour absorb for vistex v7 saves lives

item.title: Armour absorb for vistex v7 saves lives
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

okay i will rephrase it. what is your problem? give a step by step scenario, not a run on sentence.
what are you doing(the cause of problem)?
what happens(the problem)?
what is supposed to happen?
what have you tried so far?
did you modify something and the problem start? if so, what?
Do you know where the problem is?
Do you know what method it is in?

Read full topic
